name: Millionaire Life Simulator
description:
FEATURES
• Customize your character appearance
• A realistic life simulation game
• Live a life like dream
• Setup your own company and sell your products to world

FRIENDS
• Do activities with your friends
• You can go to cinema, theatre, concert with a friend in Millionaire Life Simulator

LOVE & MARRIAGE
• Fall in love with someone like in your dreams
• You can marriage with your love in Millionaire Life Simulator like real life
• Meet the love of your life

HAVE A CHILD
• You can have a child and continue to new life as your child

VIRTUAL CRYPTOCOINS*
• You can sell cryptocoins or convert to cash money
• *In Millionaire Life Simulator, all cryptocurrencies are figment and can't convert to real world cash

PETS
• Feed your pet
• Love your pet
• Play with your pet

HOUSE DESIGN
• Design your house like in your dreams
• Buy new features for your new house
• Renovate your house
• Design rooms of your house

JOBS
• Start as beggar and become the richest businessman
• A lot of jobs for cash money available in Millionaire Life Simulator

CHALLENGE WITH OTHERS
• Challenge with other players and be best
• Be the richest Millionaire Life Simulator player

IMPROVE YOURSELF
• Improve your skills for new jobs
• Make more money

VEHICLES & HOUSES
• Upgrade your houses and cars to best level
• Purchase most expensive luxury cars
• Purchase best houses

WORLD TOUR
• Visit different countries
• Collect postcards from vacations
• Visit all popular places

HOBBIES
• A lot of hobbies available in Millionaire Life Simulator
• Do your hobbies to be happy like in real life
